description.zh-cn: 男，祖籍浙江绍兴，中华人民共和国人工智能和计算机图形学专家，浙江大学计算机学院终身教授。曾任浙江大学校长、中国工程院常务副院长、全国政协外事委员会主任。中共第十六、十七届候补中央委员。
description.en: Male, with ancestral roots in Shaoxing, Zhejiang, is an expert in artificial intelligence and computer graphics in the People's Republic of China. He is a tenured professor at the College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University. He previously served as President of Zhejiang University, Executive Vice President of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, and Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the CPPCC National Committee. He was also an alternate member of the 16th and 17th Central Committees of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会
en: Foreign Affairs Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会主任，是潘云鹤的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the National Committee of the CPPCC, he was the predecessor to Pan Yunhe.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国财政部部长，接替潘云鹤担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Finance of the People's Republic of China, he succeeded Pan Yunhe as the Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工程科学技术界的最高荣誉性、咨询性学术机构。
description.en: The highest honorary and advisory academic institution for engineering and technological sciences in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、科学家，曾任中国工程院院长。潘云鹤在其任内担任常务副院长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and scientist who served as the President of the Chinese Academy of Engineering. Pan Yunhe served as Executive Vice President during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、科学家，曾任中国工程院院长。潘云鹤在其任内担任常务副院长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and scientist who served as the President of the Chinese Academy of Engineering. Pan Yunhe served as Executive Vice President during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省杭州市的一所综合性研究型大学，是中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China. It is a national key university directly administered by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家与政治人物，曾任浙江大学校长，是潘云鹤的前任。
description.en: A Chinese scientist and politician who served as the President of Zhejiang University, he was the predecessor to Pan Yunhe.

description.zh-cn: 中国力学家，曾任浙江大学校长，接替潘云鹤担任该职务。
description.en: A Chinese mechanician who served as the President of Zhejiang University, succeeding Pan Yunhe in the position.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省的省会。潘云鹤于1946年出生于此。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, China. Pan Yunhe was born here in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的综合性研究型大学，是中华人民共和国教育部直属的全国重点大学。潘云鹤在此就读建筑学专业。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China. It is a national key university directly administered by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China. Pan Yunhe studied architecture here.

nodes.id: 加利福尼亚大学洛杉矶分校

zh-cn: 加利福尼亚大学洛杉矶分校

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所公立研究型大学。潘云鹤曾在此担任访问学者。
description.en: A public research university in the United States. Pan Yunhe was a visiting scholar here.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所私立研究型大学。潘云鹤曾在此担任访问学者。
description.en: A private research university in the United States. Pan Yunhe was a visiting scholar here.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会候补委员

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会候补委员
en: Alternate member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的成员，在中央委员出缺时有递补为中央委员的资格。潘云鹤曾是第十六届、十七届候补中央委员。
description.en: A member of the CPC Central Committee who is eligible to fill a vacancy of a full member. Pan Yunhe was an alternate member of the 16th and 17th Central Committees.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing body of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

en: Academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering

description.zh-cn: 中国工程科学技术方面的最高学术称号。
description.en: The highest academic title in the field of engineering science and technology in China.

description.zh-cn: 研究、开发用于模拟、延伸和扩展人的智能的理论、方法、技术及应用系统的一门新的技术科学。潘云鹤是该领域的专家。
description.en: A new technical science that studies and develops theories, methods, technologies, and application systems to simulate, extend, and expand human intelligence. Pan Yunhe is an expert in this field.

description.zh-cn: 使用计算机生成图像的科学。潘云鹤是该领域的专家。
description.en: The science of generating images with the aid of computers. Pan Yunhe is an expert in this field.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤担任中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会外事委员会主任。
description.en: Pan Yunhe served as the Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

position.zh-cn: 常务副院长、党组副书记
position.en: Executive Vice President, Deputy Party Group Secretary

description.zh-cn: 2006年6月至2014年6月，潘云鹤担任中国工程院常务副院长、党组副书记（正部级）。
description.en: From June 2006 to June 2014, Pan Yunhe served as the Executive Vice President and Deputy Party Group Secretary of the Chinese Academy of Engineering (ministerial level).

description.zh-cn: 1995年5月至2006年6月，潘云鹤担任浙江大学校长。
description.en: From May 1995 to June 2006, Pan Yunhe served as the President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 1965年至1970年，潘云鹤就读于上海同济大学建筑学专业。
description.en: From 1965 to 1970, Pan Yunhe studied architecture at Tongji University in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 1978年至1981年，潘云鹤在浙江大学计算机系攻读硕士学位。
description.en: From 1978 to 1981, Pan Yunhe pursued a master's degree in the Department of Computer Science at Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤于1946年11月4日出生在中华民国浙江省杭州市。
description.en: Pan Yunhe was born on November 4, 1946, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤接替赵启正，就任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会主任。
description.en: Pan Yunhe succeeded Zhao Qizheng as Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 楼继伟接替潘云鹤，就任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会外事委员会主任。
description.en: Lou Jiwei succeeded Pan Yunhe as Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤接替路甬祥，就任浙江大学校长。
description.en: Pan Yunhe succeeded Lu Yongxiang as President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 杨卫接替潘云鹤，就任浙江大学校长。
description.en: Yang Wei succeeded Pan Yunhe as President of Zhejiang University.

description.zh-cn: 在中国工程院院长徐匡迪任内，潘云鹤担任常务副院长。
description.en: During the tenure of Xu Kuangdi as President of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, Pan Yunhe served as Executive Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 在中国工程院院长周济任内，潘云鹤担任常务副院长。
description.en: During the tenure of Zhou Ji as President of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, Pan Yunhe served as Executive Vice President.

relationships.target: 加利福尼亚大学洛杉矶分校

description.zh-cn: 1986年至1987年，潘云鹤在美国加利福尼亚大学洛杉矶分校建筑与规划研究院担任访问学者。
description.en: From 1986 to 1987, Pan Yunhe was a visiting scholar at the Graduate School of Architecture and Urban Planning at the University of California, Los Angeles.

description.zh-cn: 1987年至1988年，潘云鹤在美国卡内基梅隆大学计算机系担任访问学者。
description.en: From 1987 to 1988, Pan Yunhe was a visiting scholar in the Computer Science Department at Carnegie Mellon University.

description.zh-cn: 1997年当选为中国工程院院士。
description.en: Elected as an Academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Pan Yunhe is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会候补委员

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤是中共第十六、十七届候补中央委员。
description.en: Pan Yunhe was an alternate member of the 16th and 17th Central Committees of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2013年3月起，潘云鹤担任全国政协常务委员。
description.en: Since March 2013, Pan Yunhe has served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤是中国智能CAD领域的开拓者，在人工智能领域有重要贡献。
description.en: Pan Yunhe is a pioneer in the field of intelligent CAD in China and has made significant contributions to the field of artificial intelligence.

description.zh-cn: 潘云鹤在计算机图形学领域有重要贡献，在真实感图形描绘、光照模型和空间感色彩模型等方面均有创新。
description.en: Pan Yunhe has made significant contributions to the field of computer graphics, with innovations in realistic graphics rendering, lighting models, and spatial color models.
